title: What is the meaning of the full song 'Daru Badnaam'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Singer: Kamal Kahlon & Param Singh Music: Pratik Studio Ni lakk tera patla jeaPatla jeaJado turdi 17 vall khaweMorni ji tor kudiyeTor kudiye (Ve kamar teri patli jese patli jee jab chalti 17 ball khati hai morni jesi chaal ladki chal ladki) Hun mundyan nu hosh kitho aaweNi nagni di akh waliyeAkh waliye (Ab ladko ko hosh kahan aye ve nagin ki ankh wali ankh wali) Ni nagni di akh waliyeSab keel te tun gabru kuwareO daaru badnaam kartiBadnaam kartiAe ta naina teryan de kaare(2) (Ve nagin ki ankh wali sab keel per tang ladkey kuwaarey o daaru badnaam kardi badnaam kardi ye to akheye teri ka kasur hai) O thekeyan de raah bhul gayeRaah bhul gayeJado takle sharabi nain tereNaina cho dulle pelhe tod diPelhe tod di (O thenko k rastey bhul gaye rasta bhul gaye jab dekhle sharabi ankhey teri ankho se nikle pehele todti pehle todti) Gall vas ch rahi na hun mereO bina datt khole kudiye(3) (Baat bas mai nahi nahi ab mere o bina dhukan khole ladki)(3) Tenu peen nu firan ethe saareO daaru badnaam kartiAe ta naina teryan de kaare(2) (Tujhe pine ko firtey yahan sare o daaru badnaam kardi ye to ankhey teri ka kasur hai)(2) Ho pata karo kede pind diKudi gidhe ch karai att jawe(3) (Ho pata karo kabhi gao ki ladki dance mai karati hai gajab)(3) Ho dj da kasoor koi naKudi chobran de seene agg lawe(2)Ho dilan utte kehar kardi(3) (Ho dj ka kasoor koi nahi ladki ladko k seeney mai aag lagaye)(2) Ho dilon per keher karti)(3) Jaggi jind jaan tere utto vaareO daaru badnaam karti (Jaggi zindagi jaan tere liye karta o daaru badnaam kardi) Ae ta naina teryan de kaareO daaru badnaam karti (Ye to ankhey teri ka kasoor hai o daaru badnaam kardi) SOURCE: A random website on Google.

Basically a unicorn was very upset so a fairy came to cheer her up. But instead of cheering her up but it turned the beautiful unicorn into a frog. THEN the mean fairy was actually an evil fairy and have the frog ice cream cake every day to torture it and the frog was so upset. BUT THEN THE FROG OVERCAME ITS TROUBLES AND SAID I DONT WANT TO BE A FROG AND TURNED INTO A UNICORN AGAIN. and that is that the song is about
